M13=0005
M14=0010
I13=0010
I3=0000
M6=0001
R12=0002
R13=0003
R14=0001
CALL(M13,I13)
CALL(M13,I13)
CALL(M14,I13)
IDLE
NOP
FINISH

.CALL(0015)
R12=R12+R13
RTS

.CALL(0020)
R12=R12-R14
DM(I3,M6)=R12
IF NE JUMP(M14,I13)
RTS

.MEMCHECK
0000 0007
0001 0006
0002 0005
0003 0004
0004 0003
0005 0002
0006 0001
0007 0000
